Class MyJoystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
        • util.MyJoystick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.parsing.IDevice, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.parsing.IInputOutput

    public class MyJoystick
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
    Adjusts joystick value to accommodate the refresh time of the program
    Author:
    Seraj B
